name: The Lost Past
description:
In this game you travel and explore the invisible city and uncover some of the mystery. 

Control:

Move: W A S D

Track: T

Fire: Left mouse

Camera: Mouse

Weapons: 1~3

Jump: Space

Menu: Escape

Document:
